title: Task 24

question.text: What does the Delivery Man have to do?

answers.answer: He has to confirm that Sophie is telling the truth
answers.feedback: He doesn't have to check that, only that the package is delivered to the right person.

answers.answer: He has to confirm he has a package to deliver
answers.feedback: He knows he has a package, the problem is delivering it to the right person

answers.answer: He has to confirm this is the right address to deliver the package
answers.feedback: He's in the building and he knows it is the correct address.

answers.answer: He has to confirm the package is delivery to Tom

dialogue.text: I need to confirm it's him before I leave this package.

description: To confirm means to say or show that something is true or correct. For example, if you confirm a plan, you say that you agree to it and will do it. If you confirm that you are delivering a package to someone, you are making sure this person is the one you were supposed to deliver the package to.
